name: thak-kon!
description:
thak-kon! is a basic collaborative clicker made by me for the "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" jam.

The size of your thak-kon! should be, more or less, the actual size you see on your screen.

Click the button, enter a name in the top right to save your score to the "global thak-kons!" total in the top left, and see how big we can go!

(also yeah stuff may be buggy, but eh, i'll learn to live with it)
